about_the_game:
Word Warp is a typing game, set in space. You have to protect your ship from incoming projectiles by typing specific incoming words. And fend off enemy vessels by finding words with the right amount of letters to destroy them and navigate your way home. An entertaining mixture between typing under stress and finding the right word at the right time.

Initially, all available words are based of the 20k most common english words. As you progress you may add to this, creating your own little linguistic arsenal.

Difficulty is based on your own typing speed and can be adjusted after each run.

If your daily occupation does not include enough typing and you enjoy the rattling of your keyboard, this game is for you.
